Summary: A series of red lights moving from south to north.
divs: Sighting DetailsLow on the horizon, I saw a series of red light moving from the south to the north. At first I went out to smoke and then notice 20-30 red lights headed north bound. I ran inside to grab my video camera and ran back out and notice the number of lights was less about 10 and they seemed to be forming into a V shape and then slowly disappeared. This took place in north Oklahoma City, looking east. I do have video footage. All I have to say is that it was exciting yet frighten...
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Edmond
There were no other sightings in Edmond on or around September 23rd 2011
